#at ksdk directory
cp -r platform/CMSIS/Include/* /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/

find platform/drivers/ -name "system_MK60F12.h" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/drivers/ -name "system_MK60F12.c" -exec cp {} /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

rm /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/system_MK60F15.c

rm /path/to/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/system_MK60F15.h 




find platform/hal/gpio/  -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/hal/gpio/  -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/drivers/gpio/  -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/drivers/gpio/  -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/hal/port/  -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/hal/port/  -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/system/clock/  -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/system/clock/  -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/hal/sim/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/hal/sim/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/hal/sim/MK60F12/ -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/hal/sim/MK60F12/ -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/hal/mcg/ -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/hal/mcg/ -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;

find platform/system/interrupt/ -type f -name "*.h" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/inc/ \;

find platform/system/interrupt/ -type f -name "*.c" -exec cp {} ../../../CIAA/Firmware/externals/drivers/cortexM4/k60_120/src/ \;
